header.title: Your Ideas, Documents, & Plans. Unified. Welcome to
header.subtitle: ThinkSync is a new kind of workspace that blends your notes, docs, and tasks into a single, organized space.

features.title: Powerful Features, Exceptional Experience
features.description: We offer comprehensive and powerful features to help you easily tackle various challenges, enhancing your productivity and user experience.

items.title: Immersive Content Creation Experience
items.description: A simple and elegant editing interface that supports mixed editing of Markdown and rich text, focusing on your content creation

items.title: Publish and Share Across the Web
items.description: One-click publishing + wide dissemination + interactive comments

wiki.title: Explore the Infinite Possibilities of ThinkSync

items.title: New Way of Team Collaboration
items.description: Break down information silos, achieve seamless cross-department collaboration, and make project progress clear at a glance.

items.title: Knowledge Accumulation and Inheritance
items.description: Build a corporate knowledge base to accumulate and pass on experience and wisdom.

items.title: Personal Growth Accelerator
items.description: Create a personal knowledge system with Markdown support, making learning notes more professional.
